wikipedia_page.main: Matthew Kay (born 12 October 1989) is an English footballer who plays for Squires Gate as a midfielder.

response: Sinclair was born in Dulwich, London, but grew up in Manchester. He began his career at Blackpool where he played from 1989 to 1993. When he made his debut for Blackpool, on 19 August 1989, he became the club's youngest ever player, at 16 years, five months, breaking Colin Greenall's record set nine years earlier. Sinclair's record was in turn broken by Matty Kay in November 2005.
| 17 October 2008 || AM ||  || Matty Kay || Fleetwood Town || 30 December 2008 ||
